name: Sunny days (UsernameAlreadyTakenByMe)
description:
This is a child like game, where you play as a child and do your daily tasks in a safe environment. When you have completed all the tasks you can go to bed to finish the day. It's the small things that can sometimes feel magical. Controls: w,a,s,d - to walk around.

Mouse to look around.

E - to interact with door's and items. 

Q - to pee Remember dont spend to much time watching tv :)
